security: The document is marked "Background Use Only. Do Not Reproduce," suggesting the information contained within is sensitive and not intended for wider distribution. Unauthorized reproduction could reveal intelligence-gathering methods or compromise sources. The document could reveal intelligence-gathering methods or compromise sources.
summary: A memo from Chris Hopkins to SE/BB/A, attaching a copy of Maami TWX 13477 concerning Albanian cryptographic material for information.
summary_one_paragraph: On August 25, 1976, Chris Hopkins sent a memo from 17 Hq. to SE/BB/A, forwarding a copy of Maami TWX 13477 related to Albanian cryptographic material. The memo, marked for background use only and not to be reproduced, was sent via LA/COG and includes the reference number HH-28312, with an E-2 IMPDET CL by 006875.
title: Albanian Cryptographic Material
